snippet: A New York State investigation found that the school district, on Long Island, unlawfully denied or delayed an education to undocumented children.
abstract: Westbury school district in Long Island agrees to change enrollment policies after investigation by state's attorney general revealed it unlawfully denied or delayed education to undocumented children.
lead_paragraph: A New York State investigation found that the school district, on Long Island, unlawfully denied or delayed an education to undocumented children.

headline.main: Westbury Schools Agree to Alter Enrollment Policies for Immigrants
